sys_script.name: Complete Telco Order State

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_9d6bdab9db62b19040eae46b139619ff
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_g_sonc_ns_pro_nspro_tasks</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_g_sonc_ns_pro_nspro_tasks">provisioning_stateIN11,12^EQ<item display_value="11,12" endquery="false" field="provisioning_state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="11,12"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Complete Telco Order State</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// if all tasks for this Telco Order are closed, close the Telco Order
	gr = new GlideRecord('x_g_sonc_ns_pro_nspro_tasks');
	gr.addQuery('telco_order', current.telco_order);
	gr.addQuery('provisioning_state', '<', 11); // check to see if any are not completed
	gr.query();
	if (!gr.hasNext()) {
		// everything is closed/canceled so close the telco order
		var telcoGr = new GlideRecord('x_g_sonc_ns_pro_telco_order');
		if (telcoGr.get(current.telco_order)) {
			telcoGr.provisioning_state = '3';
			telcoGr.update();
		}
		else {
			gs.error('Unable to close Telco Order for task ' + current.number + ' even though all tasks seem to be closed');
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-17 12:44:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9d6bdab9db62b19040eae46b139619ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Complete Telco Order State</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9d6bdab9db62b19040eae46b139619ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-02 17:33:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9d6bdab9db62b19040eae46b139619ff"/></record_update>
